solution_line_template: A week's worth of rawhide bones cost {rawhide_bone_cost_per_unit}*{rawhide_bones_per_evening}*{days_per_week}=<<{rawhide_bone_cost_per_unit}*{rawhide_bones_per_evening}*{days_per_week}={weekly_rawhide_cost}>>{weekly_rawhide_cost} dollars.

A week's worth of dog biscuits cost {dog_biscuit_cost_per_unit}*{dog_biscuits_per_evening}*{days_per_week}=<<{dog_biscuit_cost_per_unit}*{dog_biscuits_per_evening}*{days_per_week}={weekly_biscuit_cost}>>{weekly_biscuit_cost} dollars,
Thus, in total, it cost {weekly_rawhide_cost}+{weekly_biscuit_cost}=<<{weekly_rawhide_cost}+{weekly_biscuit_cost}={total_weekly_cost}>>{total_weekly_cost} dollars
